ing: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TELÂ®)
2 (6 ounce) cans chunk white chicken, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A great tasting soup I threw together when I was doing Phase 1 on the South BeachÂ® diet. Very filling and satisfying, and even better the next day!"
ins: Stir chicken broth, black beans, diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, petite diced tomatoes, chicken, garlic, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper together in a large pot; bring to a simmer and cook until hot and flavors combine, about 20 minutes.
